content: a sawgaw floof is a decorative plushie in the game warframe based on an ingame creature called a sawgaw i freehanded this one as gift to a friend and later decided to write the pattern down properly hook size 3mm or small enough to crochet your chosen yarn somewhat tight enough to not let the filling peek through pattern is of advanced difficulty - there are many parts and the attachment process requires patience and some precision as well as some level of freehanding for the eyes i used plastic safety eyes but if you have an alternative i m not going to stop you you will also need filling and a tapestry needle pattern uses three yarns of the same size but different colours the yarn that this pattern was made with is https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/zeeman-royal the three colours referred to in this pattern will be belly colour blue in pictured takes about 36m/15g wing colour black in pictured takes about 120m/50g with mentioned yarn and accent colour white in pictured takes about 36m/15g the finished sawgaw takes up ~30cm horizontally ~22cm vertically and ~20cm in width photos and videos are included for some parts of the process
